text: Ciarán Hinds ( ; born 9 February 1953) is an Irish movie, television and stage actor. He is known for his roles in Road to Perdition, The Sum of All Fears, The Phantom of the Opera, Munich, There Will Be Blood, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2, The Woman in Black, Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy, Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance and Frozen. He played Steppenwolf, in the 2017 movie Justice League and its director's cut in 2021. In 2022, Hinds was nominated for an Academy Award for his role in Belfast. He also Stared as Puddleglum in Netflix's The Chronicles of Narnia: The Silver Chair in 2025. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Website dedicated to his works on stage and screen * Youthaction.org Northern Ireland Organization Supported by Hinds Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Actors from Belfast
